name: silent night christmas tree skirt
sizes_available: 47" diameter with 5" diameter hole at center
notes:
pattern is free when you sign up for the [creative crochet corner newsletter.][1]

**this pattern was featured in a live creative crochet corner event. you can watch the how-to video that goes along with this pattern over [here on the creative crochet corner website][2]. it is free to all!  ** 


inspired by quiet christmastime memories, watching the snow fall outside my living room window, this tree skirt evokes a calm, cozy version of the winter holiday season. 
the tree skirt is worked in turned rows, from the center, out. puff stitches are sprinkled throughout a background of simple single crochet stitches. the cabled pine tree stitch pattern is simpler than it looks and makes for a fun ending to this large project.


  [1]: http://go.creativecrochetcorner.com/a33066/
  [2]: https://www.creativecrochetcorner.com/video/silent-night-christmas-tree-skirt/
